title: 5/12/17 - Bill O'Reilly talks to Glenn in his first interview since leaving Fox News
description:
Humans and sharks doing things they shouldn't be doing together? ...President Trump calls FBI Director Jim Comey a 'show boat' ...Bill O'Reilly joins Glenn for the first time since leaving Fox News ...Has O'Reily been the target of left wing lies? ...How far can you stretch a $25 million dollar settlement?...A lesson in pronunciation ...What is 'poogling' and does President Trump do it every morning? ...Child porn PSA. Real or not? You decide.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
